subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Adam Scott of Australia blew a four-shot lead with four holes to play at the 141st British Open, recalling his countryman Greg Norman’s collapse at another major years ago.
snippet: Adam Scott of Australia blew a four-shot lead with four holes to play at the 141st British Open, recalling his countryman Greg Norman’s collapse at another major years ago.
